name: argon_one_up
description: UPS battery monitoring, fan control, and power management for Argon ONE UP case
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Provides UPS battery monitoring, automatic fan control, power button handling, and lid close detection for Argon ONE UP case. Supports Raspberry Pi 4 and Pi 5. Configures EEPROM PSU_MAX_CURRENT for proper UPS operation on Pi 5.
volumio_info.changelog: 1.1.1: Fix CPU temp/fan speed display using Pi 5 native PWM fan (dtoverlay=cooling_fan). 1.1.0: Keyboard handler with configurable volume (off by default for triggerhappy), custom script support, brightness, battery key. 1.0.1: Config persistence fix, UI load from disk, EEPROM/type coercion. 1.0.0: Initial release
